
# Table of Contents {#contents}

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
source(here::here("inst/book/setup.R"))
knitr::opts_chunk$set(options(knitr.kable.NA = ''))
library(readxl)
library(kableExtra)
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
read_excel("data/contents.xlsx") %>%
  select(Chapter, Unit, Dataset, Functions) %>%
  kable(align = "l") %>%

  row_spec(row = c(1, 6, 10, 34), background = "#e6e6e6", color = "#104e8b")
```
